meanings.definition: The process by which red blood cells are produced.
meanings.sent1: Erythropoieses is essential for the body to make red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study erythropoieses to understand how our bodies create red blood cells.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher explained erythropoieses as the 'birth' of red blood cells.
meanings.sent4: In the factory of the body, erythropoieses works tirelessly to manufacture red blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The magic of erythropoieses transforms simple elements into life-giving red blood cells.

meanings.definition: The formation of red blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Understanding erythropoieses helps us grasp how red blood cells are made.
meanings.sent2: Scientists have made great strides in researching erythropoieses and its role in our health.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of tiny workers inside our bodies creating red blood cells through erythropoieses.
meanings.sent4: Like a symphony conductor, erythropoieses orchestrates the creation of red blood cells in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of erythropoieses lies in its ability to craft intricate red blood cells from simple components.
